title: Bai Bian Xiao Ba season5
synopsis: The Variety School Bus is an artificial intelligence school bus. Its usual duty is to transport the children to and from school and protect their safety. Once the children encounter an emergency crisis, the Variety School Bus will immediately transform into a police car, fire truck, ambulance, airplane, rescue boat or submarine and arrive, using various interesting tools to help the children in all aspects to resolve the crisis . While guarding the children's safety, the Variety School Bus will also teach the children some knowledge about natural society, interpersonal communication, living habits, safety skills and other aspects. They are the heroes of the children. In the story of the fifth season of "The Variety School Bus", the Variety School Bus will continue to accompany and guard the children, help them learn to deal with safety issues in life, better deal with their emotions and interpersonal relationships, and gain more fun Useful knowledge will eventually let the children learn to grow by themselves! (translated from iqiyi)
